keyMoments.description: Pell makes the ultimate sacrifice by grabbing the bomb and flying it high into the sky, declaring himself as Arabasta's Guardian Deity before the explosion
keyMoments.significance: One of the most heroic and emotional moments in the Arabasta Arc, exemplifying Pell's devotion to protecting the kingdom

reveals.information: Pell apparently sacrifices his life to save Arabasta from the bomb explosion

abilities.name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Falcon
abilities.description: Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows transformation into a falcon hybrid and full falcon form

abilities.name: High-speed flight
abilities.description: Can fly at incredible speeds in falcon form to carry heavy objects and people

relationships.description: Serves as one of Vivi's most trusted guardians and protects the royal family

keyMoments.description: Vivi defeats Mr. 7 and Miss Father's Day but discovers she cannot disable the bomb's timer
keyMoments.significance: Shows Vivi's combat abilities but also the crushing realization that she cannot save her kingdom alone

keyMoments.description: Vivi witnesses Pell's sacrifice as he carries the bomb into the sky and it explodes
keyMoments.significance: A devastating emotional moment as Vivi loses one of her most loyal protectors

abilities.name: Peacock Slashers
abilities.description: Wire weapons attached to Vivi's fingers that she uses in combat

relationships.description: Pell serves as one of Vivi's guardians and makes the ultimate sacrifice to protect her kingdom

keyMoments.description: Mr. 7 and Miss Father's Day shoot at Vivi and Chopper while they try to reach the bomb, hitting Zoro instead
keyMoments.significance: Final attempt to prevent the Straw Hats from stopping the bomb

keyMoments.description: Mr. 7 is defeated by Vivi at the clock tower
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of Mr. 7's role as a Baroque Works agent protecting the bomb

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Works as part of a sniping pair with Miss Father's Day

relationships.description: Works as a sniping team with Miss Father's Day for Baroque Works

names.japanese: ミス・ファーザーズデー

keyMoments.description: Miss Father's Day and Mr. 7 shoot at Vivi and Chopper, hitting Zoro who protects them
keyMoments.significance: Final attempt to prevent the Straw Hats from stopping the bomb

keyMoments.description: Miss Father's Day is defeated by Vivi at the clock tower
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of Miss Father's Day's role as a Baroque Works agent

abilities.name: Lady Smash
abilities.description: Attack used in combination with Mr. 7

relationships.description: Works as a sniping team with Mr. 7 for Baroque Works

keyMoments.description: Luffy is poisoned by Crocodile's hook during their battle, with the venom making his body numb
keyMoments.significance: Raises the stakes of the final battle as Luffy must overcome both Crocodile and the deadly poison

reveals.information: Luffy is poisoned by scorpion venom from Crocodile's golden hook

keyMoments.description: Crocodile poisons Luffy with his golden hook's scorpion venom and mocks him as the poison takes effect
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Crocodile's ruthless fighting style and willingness to use any means to defeat his opponents

reveals.information: Crocodile's golden hook contains a hidden poisonous hook filled with scorpion venom strong enough to melt rock

abilities.name: Poison Hook
abilities.description: The golden part of Crocodile's hook is hollow and contains a poisonous hook with powerful scorpion venom

keyMoments.description: Tashigi leads Marines in attacking Baroque Works agents and rallies them to focus on the real enemy rather than the Straw Hats
keyMoments.significance: Shows Tashigi's growth as a leader and her understanding of her own sense of justice

reveals.information: Tashigi demonstrates leadership by directing Marines to fight Baroque Works instead of pursuing the Straw Hats

keyMoments.description: Zoro pushes Vivi and Chopper out of the way and takes a bullet from Mr. 7 and Miss Father's Day to protect them
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's willingness to sacrifice himself to help Vivi save her kingdom
